itemDescription: Archivist of the Moravian Church in Jamaica 1957–1986

wikipedia_page.main: Bethlehem Moravian College (formerly Bethlehem Teacher Training College) is a college located in Malvern, Jamaica.  The college grants the bachelor's degree in primary and secondary education, business studies, and hospitality and tourism management.  The College was founded in 1861 by the Jamaica Province of the Moravian Church.

link_mentions.page: Jamaica Province of the Moravian Church
response: The church established its own archives in 1957 at the Bethlehem Teachers' College, under the supervision of Mrs Vera MacLeavy.  In 1974 the records were placed in temporary deposit at the Jamaica Archives.  The five categories of records in the collection are:
